title: Google Pours AI Powers Into Its New Pixel Phone and Home Assistant
description: Just announced, an AI-powered multimodal super assistant, AI-powered photo editors, and more.

title: Google introduces AI to Android and Google Assistant
description:
Google announced in separate statements on Oct. 4 that is in the process of adding artificial intelligence (AI) features to two of its flagship products. First, Google unveiled Assistant with Bard. This announcement means that Google’s Bard AI tool — which is already available through several Google web services — will be integrated with the […]

The post Google introduces AI to Android and Google Assistant appeared first on CryptoSlate.
